main event: A green flare was observed falling in the Hawaiian Islands on 17 March 1960.
interesting points: The flare was visible for 5 seconds,The object was a single green flare descending and then disappearing into the horizon,The sighting was recorded by three observers who agreed on the description,The object was sighted at about 25 feet above the horizon,The observers described a bright flash lasting before the flare descended.
